patthana16.23:2.1: Kusalaṃ bāhiraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nabāhiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana16.23:3.1: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
patthana16.23:4.1: Abyākataṃ upādā dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana16.23:5.1: Kusalaṃ noupādā dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nanoupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā pannarasa, adhipatiyā pannarasa …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate pannarasa.
patthana16.23:6.1: Abyākataṃ upādinnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Abyākataṃ upādinnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo naupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Abyākataṃ upādinnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naupādinno ca naakusalo naupādinno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
